title: Pope Francis returns to Lesbos, Greece, five years after flying migrants out of the camp there
content:
1. Pope Francis returns to Lesbos, Greece, five years after flying migrants out of the camp there  The Washington Post
  2. Pope Francis speaks out on healing the rift between the Catholic and Orthodox churches  Fox News
  3. In Cyprus, Pope Francis Laments Indifference Toward Migrants  The New York Times
  4. Vatican takes in 12 migrants as pope denounces indifference  Associated Press
  5. Pope to facilitate re-location of 50 migrants, Cyprus says  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 教皇フランシスコは、ギリシャのレスボス島のキャンプから移民を脱出させてから5年後に戻ってきました。
教皇方济各在移民飞离希腊莱斯博斯营地五年后重返那里
教皇方濟各在移民飛離希臘萊斯博斯營地五年後重返那裏
